name: The Inn
description:
Will you be able to manage your Inn? Receive orders from customers and cook.

Developers: Quaky (quaky.itch.io), Stadoblech (stadoblech.itch.io)

Music and sounds: Diego Demarco (www.demarcosound.com)

External assets: 

  • Food sprites: VECTORPIXELSTAR https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/food(edited)
  • Inn, Kitchen furniture: Ayene-chan https://www.deviantart.com/ayene-chan/art/RPG-Maker-VX-Ace-Inn-505365692
  • Inn Furniture: Hishimy https://www.deviantart.com/hishimy/art/RPG-Maker-VX-Ace-tilesets-1-507603721
